changeSet.comment: Master table which holds all villages and their respective categories
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SEARCH_LOCATION_CATEGORY ( Id INT AUTO_INCREMENT, Village VARCHAR(50) not null, Tehsil VARCHAR(50) not null, District VARCHAR(50) not null, Category INT not null REFERENCES SEARCH_LOCATION_CATEGORY_TYPE(id), LastUpdatedOn TIMESTAMP not null, PRIMARY KEY (Id), CONSTRAINT UC_Location_Category UNIQUE (Village, Tehsil, District, Category) );
